scripts.build: npm run build:dist-folder && npm run build:bundle
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run build && mkdocs gh-deploy -r upstream || mkdocs gh-deploy -r origin
scripts.test-coverage: nyc --reporter text --reporter html --reporter lcovonly npm run test
